original_text: And Jesus would die not only for Israel's people. He would also die for all God's people who lived in many different places. He would bring them all together. They would become like one big family.
korean_text: 또 그 민족만 위할 뿐 아니라 흩어진 하나님의 자녀를 모아 하나가 되게 하기 위하여 죽으실 것을 미리 말함이러라

sentences.original_text: And Jesus would die not only for Israel's people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 예수님은 이스라엘 백성만을 위해 죽으실 것이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He would also die for all God's people
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 또한 모든 하나님의 백성을 위해 죽으실 것이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: who lived in many different places.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 여러 다른 곳에서 살고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He would bring them all together.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 그들을 모두 하나로 모으실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: They would become like one big family.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나의 큰 가족처럼 될 것입니다.
